snippet: Americans officials want to rotate more military forces through the country, concerned about mounting pressure from China on its neighbors.
abstract: Sec of State John Kerry says United States will give Philippines $40 million in maritime security assistance and is negotiating with Manila to rotate more American military forces through country; moves are latest signs of Obama administration’s concerns about mounting pressure from China on its neighbors.
lead_paragraph: Americans officials want to rotate more military forces through the country, concerned about mounting pressure from China on its neighbors.

headline.main: U.S. Forging Closer Military Ties With Philippines
headline.print_headline: Bolstering Military Ties, U.S. Gives Philippines Aid

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
